sentence.Network_en: We were finally released with a formal warning that we were henceforth barred from the base.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们被正式警告从此不得进入基地后终于获得了释放。

sentence.Network_en: Henceforth, parties which fail to get 5% of the vote will not be represented in par-liament.
sentence.Network_cn: 从今以后，选票数量未达到总数5%的党派将不能在议会里占有席位。

sentence.Network_en: Henceforth I expect you to be punctual for meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望你今后准时到会。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... hence 因此 henceforth 从今以后 her 她.
六级词汇词根+联想记忆法 ... hemisphere --n. 半球 henceforth --adv. 自此以后,今后 herb --n. 药草,香草.
以h开头的英语英文单词 ... henceforth 今后，从今以后 henceforward 自此以后,今后 henchman 亲信，心腹.
Caractère  - Dictionnaire de... ... 先后[ early or late] 以后[ later;thereafter;henceforward] 已后[ after;later].

entry.def: Henceforth means from this time onwards.

example.ex: Henceforth, parties which fail to get 5% of the vote will not be represented in parliament...
example.tran: 从今以后，选票数量未达到总数5%的党派将不能在议会里占有席位。

example.ex: We were finally released with a formal warning that we were henceforth barred from the base.
example.tran: 我们被正式警告从此不得进入基地后终于获得了释放。

means.word_mean: 1. from this time forth; from now on;
